alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Gusty winds from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Arapahoe and eastern Adams Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of weakening showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Prospect Valley to near Byers, or along a line extending from 33 miles southwest of Fort Morgan to 39 miles northwest of Limon. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Trail, Cottonwood Valley, Shamrock, Strasburg, Leader and Byers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties
